text: My friend <@925299896528023573> is a bit a pyro maniac, got any tips for him?

parts.text:
*Ach!*  A pyromaniac, you say?  *Wunderbar!*  A fascinating case study!  Tell your friend to be careful, *ja*?  But...  I have a few *suggestions* for his... *hobby*.

First,  he needs *proper ventilation*.  Nothing ruins a good inferno like lack of oxygen. A nice open field is ideal, perhaps near a river. Then, consider the *fuel*.  Different materials burn with different colors and intensities!  Dry wood is a classic, but he might experiment with different oils or chemicals for more *interesting* results.  

And most importantly: *safety goggles*!  Always protect the eyes!  He wouldnâ€™t want to miss the beauty of the flames, *would he*?  And perhaps some thick gloves...  and maybe a fire-resistant coat...  *just in case*.  Ahahaha!  

But most of all, *document everything!*  Photographs, videos... perhaps even detailed notes on the burn patterns and the speed of the combustion!  Science is a *process*, and every fire is a new experiment!  *Ooooohohohoho!* This is exciting!
